name: VR Christmas Journey Joy Ride
description:
Travel through North Pole and enjoy a VR XMAS train ride with Santa and elfs. Make a family reunion and show them this xmas joy ride filled with Christmas spirit. Relax yourself with our virtual reality rollercoaster theme ride.

Features:
- animated Santa, Elf and Snowman characters
- Jingle Bells music in the background
- works with all VR glasses
- no touch controls needed
- kids will love it

Note: This app requires a VR headset (Google Cardboard, Durovis Dive, Dodocase VR, VRelia GO, Homido) for best results.
